timeline.author: MiguelPires

timeline.bodyText: SonarLint complains about the nested try here. We could fix that and also make this less repetitive by refactoring it to a validateTimeout method. If the validation fails, we can throw an exception stating what we expect. Something like "Connect/read timeout is XYZ, expected timeout to be a positive number smaller than Integer.MAX_VALUE". Wdyt?
timeline.author: MiguelPires

replies.bodyText: Agree, that makes sense, I'll fix that :)
